sentences.en: " To be sure, " replied Orrin, gaily.
sentences.cn: “ 当然好啦, "奥林高兴地回答.

sentences.en: Busily, gaily , she went hither and yon.
sentences.cn: 她又匆忙又高兴地到处奔走.

sentences.en: Emerson's Scottish friend Carlyle, once gaily radical, turned sour.
sentences.cn: 埃默森的苏格兰朋友卡莱尔, 一度是劲头十足的过激派, 后来也垂头丧气.

sentences.en: Gaily - dressed ladies added colour and variety to the scene.
sentences.cn: 身穿鲜艳服装的妇女使场面更为绚丽多采.

sentences.en: Gaily he asked them what they had learned.
sentences.cn: 他笑着问他们都学了些什么.

sentences.en: He put on a gaily coloured shirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿上一件花哨的衬衫。

sentences.en: The boys'troubles vanished away, and they went gaily to their posts.
sentences.cn: 孩子们心中的忧虑云消雾散了, 全都高高兴兴的走到自己的岗位.

sentences.en: The girls can already be heard in the distance chattering gaily.
sentences.cn: 人们老远就可以听见姑娘们高兴的叽叽喳喳声.

sentences.en: The little girl was chattering gaily all the way.
sentences.cn: 那小女孩一路上兴高采烈地说个不停.

sentences.en: The sunbeams send the blood running gaily through the veins.
sentences.cn: 阳光驱动血液在血管里欢快地流动.
